intro.title: About me
desc: As a business major, I approach problems from a strategic perspective and have built practical skills across both backend and frontend development through experience at a startup. I'm particularly interested in analyzing user behavior based on data and leveraging insights to improve services. I aim to be a problem-solving developer who is capable not only in development but also in data analysis.

lists.institution: Big Data Analysis & Recommendation System Development Bootcamp

lists.title: TwoMore
info: A mobile fitness tracking app that makes workout routine management easier and more systematic.
You can record sets, repetitions, and weights for each exercise in real-time, and save and manage personal routines and history.

lists.title: Konnect
info: A comprehensive assistant for foreigners who live or travel in Korea.
Provides various features such as travel itinerary planning, chatbot, and tourist information.

lists.title: AgingLOC
info: AgingLOC is a platform that provides personalized healthcare services based on clinical evidence. 118 exercise guide videos and 168 combinations of exercise programs are provided by simple questionnaires, physical fitness tests, and adjusted by feedback.
Participated in refactoring, maintenance, troble shooting, and development of admin system for managing exercise programs.

lists.title: Crack Detector
info: Developed a prototype of a mobile app that captures road surfaces with a camera, analyzes each frame in real-time using a YOLO model to detect cracks and sinkholes, and overlays bounding boxes on the smartphone screen during live recording.

lists.title: MEDI-EYE
info: MEDI-EYE is a digital healthcare system that allows doctors to prescribe specific wavelength combinations to each patient through a web browser. Patients can conveniently check their prescription information through a smartphone app and then use BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) to operate medical devices for eye disease treatment.
Participated in the design phase, testing, and was responsible for server migration and maintenance.

contact.desc: I'm always looking for new opportunities and collaborations. Please feel free to contact me anytime. I look forward to working together to create great projects.

footer.desc: Developer who enjoys communication and collaboration
